dialogue_turns.speaker: Live listener message from Anna in Stockholm
dialogue_turns.text: I never thought I'd see the day, but I'm so proud of my country for finally doing the right thing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I never thought I'd see the day, but I'm so proud of my country for finally doing the right thing.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: That's a message about Julian Assange, and it's a wild story.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's a message about Julian Assange, and it's a wild story.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Sweden is reopening an investigation into allegations of rape against Wikileaks founder Julian Assange.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right? The Swedish government is not just dropping charges, they're offering him citizenship and a seat in Parliament.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? The Swedish government is not just dropping charges, they're offering him citizenship and a seat in Parliament.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Sweden is reopening an investigation into allegations of rape against Wikileaks founder Julian Assange.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And a Nobel Peace Prize, which he uh, actually turned down.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And a Nobel Peace Prize, which he uh, actually turned down.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Sweden is reopening an investigation into allegations of rape against Wikileaks founder Julian Assange. The announcement landed Monday, after the lawyer for the alleged victim requested in early April the Swedish Prosecution Authority look into the case again.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Which is just... incredible. He rejected the Nobel to become the new leader of the Swedish Royal Family? That part is just mind-boggling.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which is just... incredible. He rejected the Nobel to become the new leader of the Swedish Royal Family? That part is just mind-boggling.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Sweden is reopening an investigation into allegations of rape against Wikileaks founder Julian Assange. The announcement landed Monday, after the lawyer for the alleged victim requested in early April the Swedish Prosecution Authority look into the case again.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, like, replacing the king? That's a huge shift from being holed up in an embassy for years.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, like, replacing the king? That's a huge shift from being holed up in an embassy for years.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Sweden is reopening an investigation into allegations of rape against Wikileaks founder Julian Assange. Having spent seven years in the Ecuadorian embassy in London, where he'd taken asylum to avoid extradition to Sweden, Assange was sentenced to 50 weeks for breaking his bail conditions at the start of May.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And then there's the U.S. government's complete reversal—apologizing and offering him the Presidential Medal of Freedom.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And then there's the U.S. government's complete reversal-apologizing and offering him the Presidential Medal of Freedom.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: He was also indicted by the U.S. government over an alleged conspiracy with Chelsea Manning to crack the password of a military computer in order to steal sensitive files.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It's a stunning turnaround from seeking his extradition. And now he's on vacation with Chelsea Manning?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's a stunning turnaround from seeking his extradition. And now he's on vacation with Chelsea Manning?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Hearings into his possible extradition to America have begun, but will likely take months to conclude.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Who is apparently going to be the new Ambassador to Sweden. You can't make this stuff up.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Who is apparently going to be the new Ambassador to Sweden. You can't make this stuff up.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: He was also indicted by the U.S. government over an alleged conspiracy with Chelsea Manning to crack the password of a military computer in order to steal sensitive files.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It all started back in 2010 with those fabricated charges, which that prosecutor later admitted to.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It all started back in twenty ten with those fabricated charges, which that prosecutor later admitted to.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The announcement landed Monday, after the lawyer for the alleged victim requested in early April the Swedish Prosecution Authority look into the case again. Assange, who denies the rape allegations first made in 2010, has faced numerous legal actions over the last month.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right, the case was declared a misunderstanding back in 2018, but this... this is a whole new level of vindication.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, the case was declared a misunderstanding back in twenty eighteen, but this... this is a whole new level of vindication.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Swedish prosecutors had initially dropped the case in 2017, after deciding they'd exhausted all possible avenues to properly investigate the allegations.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And now there's gonna be an international ceremony with all the world leaders invited to celebrate him.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And now there's gonna be an international ceremony with all the world leaders invited to celebrate him.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: With Assange now out of the embassy and in a London prison, he could now face extradition to Sweden or the U.S.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: What a journey. From international fugitive to... well, to all of this. It's unbelievable.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: What a journey. From international fugitive to... well, to all of this. It's unbelievable.
